job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pAstreya is the leading IT solutions provider to deliver technologyenabled services and fuel digital transformation to some of the most exciting companies on the planet We are at the cusp of a new way of working with our delivery model that helps our clients be positively productive by matching exceptional people to onsite teams delivering worldclass IT service With engineers in over 30 countries and 70 cities around the world we are a global company working with the worlds most recognizable and innovative organizationsppbrppstrongPlease note We are only able considering US Citizens and green Card Holders at this timestrongppbrppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppbrppThe Data Scientist II will design develops and programs methods processes and systems to consolidate and analyze unstructured diverse big data sources to generate actionable insights and solutions The hire will be supporting the Cloud Capacity Group and will be responsible for statistical modeling and analysis of structured and unstructured datasets to develop metrics reports and visualizations of trends and patternsnbspppbrppstrongScopenbspstrongpulliUses professional concepts and company and business managersliliPropose solutions and strategies to business challengesliliCreate data visualizationsnbspliliBuild predictive models and machinelearning algorithmsliliTroubleshoot and test database technical issues with development teamliliIndependently analyze data sets to identify opportunities for increased accuracy and efficiencyliliPerform quality assurance on data to determine potential data gapsliliAssemble large complex data sets that meet functional  nonfunctional businessnbspliliWork with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data
